Elemental Cascade.name: Elemental Cascade
Elemental Cascade.fullText:
Reforged Soul Attack 11Elemental Cascade

You release the potential raging within you as a crackling cascade of untamed energy.

Encounter        Elemental
Standard Action      Melee 1 or Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Reflex
    Level 21: Highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d10 + your highest ability modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you can repeat this attack once against a different target within range.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 136.
Elemental Cascade.flavor: You release the potential raging within you as a crackling cascade of untamed energy.
Elemental Cascade.attack:
Highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Reflex
    Level 21: Highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Reflex
Elemental Cascade.effect: Roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you can repeat this attack once against a different target within range.

Elemental Flood.name: Elemental Flood
Elemental Flood.fullText:
Reforged Soul Attack 20Elemental Flood

Energy pours out from you in a terrible flood, burning, freezing, and destroying anything in its path.

Daily        Elemental, Varies, Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Highest ability modifier + 5 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + your highest ability modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 10 damage of the types rolled for your Chaos-Touched feature (a creature can take this damage only once per turn).

Sustain Minor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 137.
Elemental Flood.flavor: Energy pours out from you in a terrible flood, burning, freezing, and destroying anything in its path.
Elemental Flood.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 10 damage of the types rolled for your Chaos-Touched feature (a creature can take this damage only once per turn).
Elemental Flood.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Flowing Chaos.name: Flowing Chaos
Flowing Chaos.fullText:
Reforged Soul Utility 12Flowing Chaos

You exude the power of the elements to aid your nearby allies by enhancing the lethality of their attacks.

Daily        Aura, Elemental
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of the encounter. While in the aura, you and each ally gain a +3 power bonus to damage rolls that include acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 137.
Flowing Chaos.flavor: You exude the power of the elements to aid your nearby allies by enhancing the lethality of their attacks.
Flowing Chaos.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of the encounter. While in the aura, you and each ally gain a +3 power bonus to damage rolls that include acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
